Room.Name: The Dwarven Drop Off
Room.Description: This is where the dwarven mommies and daddies come to drop off their annoying little brats. You have the urge to leave. There is a sign here.

Exit.Description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is an area for newbies, so have fun. -- Sandman

Room.Name: Day Care Center
Room.Description: You are in the north-east corner of the main part of the center. Toys and toddlers are all over the room. There is a kitchen to the east.

Exit.Description: You see the drop off.
You see an extremely messy kitchen.
You see a large room full of noisy brats.
You see a large room full of noisy brats.

Room.Name: Day Care Center
Room.Description: You are in the north-west corner of the main part of the center. Toys and toddlers are all over the room. There is a bathroom to the west.

Exit.Description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.
You see a large room full of noisy brats.
You see a messy bathroom.

Room.Name: Day Care Center
Room.Description: You are in the south-east corner of the main part of the center. Toys and toddlers are all over the room. There is a playground to the east.

Exit.Description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.
You see the playground.
You see a large room full of noisy brats.

Room.Name: Day Care Center
Room.Description: You are in the south-west corner of the main part of the center. Toys and toddlers are all over the room. There is a staircase to the west.

Exit.Description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.
You see a large room full of noisy brats.
You see a staircase leading down.

Room.Name: The Messy Bathroom
Room.Description: You hold your nose as you realize you have made the worst mistake of your life. The air is rancid and the walls are stained.

Exit.Description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

Room.Name: The Staircase
Room.Description: You stand on top of a staircase leading down, and wonder what mystery could lie down under. Beware!

Exit.Description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.
You see the entrance to something.

Room.Name: The Playground
Room.Description: You are in the north-west corner of the playground.

Exit.Description: You see the playground.
You see the playground.

Room.Name: The Playground
Room.Description: You are in the north-east corner of the playground.

Exit.Description: You see the playground.
You see the playground.

Room.Name: The Playground
Room.Description: You are in the south-west corner of the playground.

Exit.Description: You see the playground.
You see the playground.
You see a large room full of noisy brats.

Room.Name: The Playground
Room.Description: You are in the south-east corner of the playground.

Exit.Description: You see the playground.
You see the playground.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Mini-Maze
Room.Description: You stand in the entrance to a small, but confusing maze. You really hope that you don't get lost.

Exit.Description: You see some stairs.

Room.Name: Mini-Maze
Room.Description: You are in a small passage that looks just like every other one.

Room.Name: Mini-Maze
Room.Description: You are in a small passage that looks just like every other one.

Room.Name: Mini-Maze
Room.Description: You are in a small passage that looks just like every other one.

Room.Name: Mini-Maze
Room.Description: You are in a small passage that looks just like every other one.

Room.Name: End of the Mini-Maze
Room.Description: You stand at the end of your journey. There is a big sign here and you had better read it!

ExtraDescription.Description: If you are not level 6 or above, then don't go south!!!! It is a dangerous area, but congrats for getting this far - Sandman

Room.Name: Messy Kitchen
Room.Description: You stand in the kitchen and eating area of the day care center. Pots and pans are everywhere, while the toddlers continue to create chaos.

Exit.Description: You see a large room full of noisy brats.

Room.Name: The End?
Room.Description: You have reached the final lair. It is dominated by a huge five headed dragon (actually an overgrown brat with a Halloween mask).

NPC.name: youth dwarven dwarf
NPC.description: This is a young but not totally harmless creature.
NPC.longDescription: A young dwarf plays with a toy axe.

NPC.name: teddy bear
NPC.description: This is a tiny little bear with a heart on his chest.
NPC.longDescription: A cute and fuzzy teddy bear stands here.

NPC.name: doll raggedy anne
NPC.description: You see a small little cute rag doll.
NPC.longDescription: A raggedy anne doll is sitting here.

NPC.name: soldier toy
NPC.description: The toy is looking for target practice.
NPC.longDescription: A toy soldier is standing here.

NPC.name: bear ugly
NPC.description: This is obviously a reject from the factory. He snarls and growls at you.
NPC.longDescription: An ugly stuffed bear stands here.

NPC.name: doll old
NPC.description: This doll has been hugged and played with until there is almost nothing left.
NPC.longDescription: An abused and old doll is here.

NPC.name: nanny
NPC.description: You see an old dwarven lady who has been hunched over with age. However, it appears that there is still some fight left in her.
NPC.longDescription: An old wrinkled nanny stands here, looking over the little ones.

NPC.name: guard
NPC.description: This is a big mean bully who is tired of being lost in this maze. You suddenly think that you had better flee.
NPC.longDescription: An armed guard stands here looking lost.

NPC.name: brat spoiled
NPC.description: You see a little tyke who has always gotten what he wanted. You have the biggest urge to put him out of his misery.
NPC.longDescription: A spoiled brat is crying here.

Item.Name: axe toy
Item.LongDescription: An axe made of wood lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A small label says 'made in Taiwan'.

Item.Name: ring pink ice
Item.LongDescription: A pink ice ring draws your eye.

ExtraDescription.Description: How strange...it's made of ice, but it doesn't melt. It feels pleasantly cool to the touch.

Item.Name: robe linen
Item.LongDescription: A linen robe is crumpled into a ball here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It radiates an aura of peace and wisdom. The perfect garb for a teacher.

Item.Name: broom
Item.LongDescription: A stout straw broom lies on the floor.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's worn and tired, probably from swatting too many children.

Item.Name: meat steak
Item.LongDescription: A juicy steak sits on a plate here.

Item.Name: steak rotten
Item.LongDescription: A dry steak lies on the floor.

Item.Name: potion amber
Item.LongDescription: An amber potion sits in a corner.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's a tight-stoppered glass bottle with a thick amber liquid inside. It tastes kind of like whiskey.

Item.Name: gun toy
Item.LongDescription: A toy gun with a sharp bayonet lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's just a toy...but the point looks kind of sharp. You'll put your eye out, kid!
